name: Biggensmol
description:
Complete each room by switching between the two characters, each with their own skill set! Reach the door at the end to move onto the next level!

Global Game Jam Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/biggensmol-3

Controls:

A & D - Move left and right
Tab - switch characters
Space - Jump (small character only)
Escape/P - Pause

All sounds (disregarding music) provided by Zapsplat!
